title: Standard Operating Procedure (SOP)
summary: Complete operational guidelines for running a Wormi node, from intake to product release.

title: QA/QC Testing Protocol
summary: Maturity tests (germination index, respiration), pH/EC monitoring, batch labeling, and quarantine procedures.

title: DIY CFT Build Guide
summary: Step-by-step instructions to build a Continuous Flow Through vermireactor at home or for your node.

title: Safety & Contamination Guidelines
summary: Biofilter setup, contamination prevention, personal protective equipment, and emergency protocols.

title: Vermicomposting 101
summary: Beginner-friendly introduction to vermicomposting science, worm biology, and system design.

title: Batch Documentation Template
summary: Printable template for tracking batch codes, test results, and release dates.
